players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it strange that Alice was the one who died during the night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our grasp."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all work together to ensure the safety of our village. Let us not jump to conclusions and instead focus on gathering more information before making any accusations."
